      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Note[] notes
      Array used to keep references to Note objects.

      Field used to keep number of pages of a notepad.

      • numberOfPages

        int numberOfPages
        Field used to keep number of pages of a notepad.

      • notes

        Note[] notes
        Array used to keep references to Note objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notepad

        public Notepad(int n)
        Creates new notepad with given number of pages. Array of references to Note objects is created.
        Parameters:
        n - Defines size of array of Note objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createNote

        public void createNote(int page,
                       java.lang.String header,
                       java.lang.String content)
        Initializes selected cell of array with reference to a Note object.
        Parameters:
        page - Array cell number, considering that array cells numbers start with 0.
        header - Used in constructor as a header of the note.
        content - Used in constructor as a content of the note.

      • displayHeaders

        public void displayHeaders()
        Displays a numbered list of headers of notes. In case of empty cell (cell containing null), displays "Empty".

      • displayNote

        public void displayNote(int i)
        Displays chosen note. In case of empty cell (cell containing null), displays "The page is empty".
        Parameters:
        i - Number of a cell to display, considering that array cells numbers start with 0.

      • displayForEdition

        public void displayForEdition()
        Displays all existing notes for further edition.

      • editNote

        public void editNote(int page,
                     java.lang.String newHeader,
                     java.lang.String newContent)
        Replaces header and content of existing note with new header and new content.
        Parameters:
        page - Number of a cell of array containing note that user desires to edit, considering that array cells numbers start with 0.
        newHeader - New header of note to replace old one with.
        newContent - New content of note to replace old one with.

      • deleteNote

        public void deleteNote(int i)
        Sets null to selected cell of notes array.
        Parameters:
        i - Number of array's cell that's needed to be emptied, considering that array cells numbers start with 0.
